name: Blu -Demo Version
description:
This game is my very first attempt at making some type of game, I am more focused on the creative side of pretty much anything and so is this very short Demo. 

Blu is a Future Time Spirit and she has decided to go on a patrol after hearing  that some of the Waypoint Crystals that surround the Timeless Hub, have been attacked and are slowly getting destroyed by the Damned Spirits. A spirit should never go alone anywhere but I trust you will keep her safe for this very short journey through few areas.
